Symbol.Script_3D:
if not(gs_shadow) then SHADOW OFF
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then end
unID = 10 hotspot 0, 0, 0, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot A, 0, 0, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot A, B, 0, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot 0, B, 0, unID :unID = unID + 1
hotspot 0, 0, ZZYZX, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot A, 0, ZZYZX, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot A, B, ZZYZX, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot 0, B, ZZYZX, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot A/2, B/2, ZZYZX, unID :unID = unID + 1
pen gs_cont_pen

!================================================================================== !DETAILED !==================================================================================
resol 12
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !support leg ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ROTY 90 ADD 0, 0.112, 0.023 r = 0.003
if not(useFactoryMats) then cprism_ kMat, kMat, kMat, 9, 0.384, 0, 0, 15, 0.01 - r, 0, 79, 0.01, -r, 1079, 0.01, -r, 79, 0.01, -0.017 + r, 79, 0.01 - r, -0.017, 1079, 0.01 - r, -0.017, 79, 0, -0.017, 15, 0, 0, -1 else cprism_ "builtInMatAppleKeyboardKeys", "builtInMatAppleKeyboardKeys", "builtInMatAppleKeyboardKeys", 9, 0.384, 0, 0, 15, 0.01 - r, 0, 79, 0.01, -r, 1079, 0.01, -r, 79, 0.01, -0.017 + r, 79, 0.01 - r, -0.017, 1079, 0.01 - r, -0.017, 79, 0, -0.017, 15, 0, 0, -1 endif
DEL 2 ADD 0.002, 0.002, 0 r = 0.003 c = A - 0.004 d = B - 0.004
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !lower body part ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if not(useFactoryMats) then cprism_ kMat, kMat, kMat, 13, 0.002, 0, r, 79, 0, d - r, 79, r, d, 1079, r, d, 79, c - r, d, 79, c, d - r, 1079, c, d - r, 79, c, r, 79, c - r, 0, 1079, c - r, 0, 79, r, 0, 79, 0, r, 1079, 0, r, -1 else cprism_ "builtInMatAppleKeyboardKeys", "builtInMatAppleKeyboardKeys", "builtInMatAppleKeyboardKeys", 13, 0.002, 0, r, 79, 0, d - r, 79, r, d, 1079, r, d, 79, c - r, d, 79, c, d - r, 1079, c, d - r, 79, c, r, 79, c - r, 0, 1079, c - r, 0, 79, r, 0, 79, 0, r, 1079, 0, r, -1 endif
DEL 1 ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !top body part ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ADD 0, 0, 0.002 r = 0.005
if not(useFactoryMats) then cprism_ frMat, frMat, frMat, 13, 0.003, 0, r, 79, 0, B - r, 79, r, B, 1079, r, B, 79, A - r, B, 79, A, B - r, 1079, A, B - r, 79, A, r, 79, A - r, 0, 1079, A - r, 0, 79, r, 0, 79, 0, r, 1079, 0, r, -1 else cprism_ "builtInMatMacSilver", "builtInMatMacSilver", "builtInMatMacSilver", 13, 0.003, 0, r, 79, 0, B - r, 79, r, B, 1079, r, B, 79, A - r, B, 79, A, B - r, 1079, A, B - r, 79, A, r, 79, A - r, 0, 1079, A - r, 0, 79, r, 0, 79, 0, r, 1079, 0, r, -1 endif
DEL 1 MATERIAL kMat ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !letter pad ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
!first row ADD sdx, sdy + yBottom + 4 * yNorm + 5 * spaceY, 0.005 nButtons = 14 gosub "buttonSmalla" DEL 1
! 2nd row ADD sdx, sdy + yBottom + 3 * yNorm + 4 * spaceY, 0.005 nButtons = 13 gosub "buttonNormal" ADDX 13 * (xNorm + spaceX) brick (14 * (xSmall + spaceX)- 13 * (xNorm + spaceX)- spaceX), yNorm, 0.002 DEL 2
! 3rd row ADD sdx, sdy + yBottom +2 * yNorm + 3 * spaceY, 0.005 brick (14 * (xSmall + spaceX)- 13 * (xNorm + spaceX)- spaceX), yNorm, 0.002 ADDX (14 * (xSmall + spaceX)- 13 * (xNorm + spaceX)) nButtons = 12 gosub "buttonNormal" DEL 2
! 4th row ADD sdx, sdy + yBottom + yNorm + 2 * spaceY, 0.005 brick xCaps, yNorm, 0.002 ADDX xCaps + spaceX nButtons = 12 gosub "buttonNormal" ADDX 12 * (xNorm + spaceX) m = 14 * (xSmall + spaceX) - ( 12 * (xNorm + spaceX)) - xCaps - 2 * spaceX prism_ 7, 0.002, 0, 0, 15, m, 0, 15, m, 2 * yNorm + spaceY, 15, m - xNorm, 2 * yNorm + spaceY, 15, m - xNorm, yNorm + spaceY, 15, 0, yNorm + spaceY, 15, 0, 0, -1 DEL 3
! 5th row ADD sdx, sdy + yBottom + spaceY, 0.005 block (14 * xSmall + 12 * spaceX -xShift - 11 * (xNorm + spaceX)), yNorm, 0.002 ADDX (14 * xSmall + 13 * spaceX -xShift - 11 * (xNorm + spaceX)) nButtons = 11 gosub "buttonNormal" ADDX 11 * (xNorm + spaceX) block xShift, yNorm, 0.002 DEL 3
! 6th row ADD sdx, sdy, 0.005 brick xCont, yBottom, 0.002 ADDX xCont + spaceX brick (14 * xSmall + 12 * spaceX - xShift - 11 * (xNorm + spaceX) + 3 * xNorm + spaceX - 2 * xCont), yBottom, 0.002 ADDX (14 * xSmall + 3 * spaceX - xShift - 11 * xNorm+ 3 * xNorm - 2 * xCont) brick xCont, yBottom, 0.002 ADDX xCont + spaceX brick 6 * xNorm + 5 * spaceX, yBottom, 0.002 ADDX 6 * (xNorm + spaceX) brick xCont, yBottom, 0.002 ADDX xCont + spaceX brick (xShift + 2 * xNorm + 2 * spaceX - 2 * xCont - 2 * spaceX), yBottom, 0.002 ADDX (xShift + 2 * xNorm + 2 * spaceX - 2 * xCont - 2 * spaceX) + spaceX brick xCont, yBottom, 0.002 DEL 7
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !num pad ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ADD (A - sdx - 4 * xNorm - 3 * spaceX), (sdy + yBottom + 4 * yNorm + 5 * spaceX), 0.005 nButtons = 4 gosub "buttonSmallb" DEL 1 ADD (A - sdx - 4 * xNorm - 3 * spaceX), (sdy + yBottom + yNorm + 2 * spaceX), 0.005 for j = 1 to 3 nButtons = 4 gosub "buttonNormal" ADDY yNorm + spaceY next j DEL j ADD (A - sdx - 4 * xNorm - 3 * spaceX), (sdy + yBottom + spaceX), 0.005 nButtons = 3 gosub "buttonNormal" DEL 1 ADD (A - sdx - 4 * xNorm - 3 * spaceX), sdy, 0.005 brick (2 * xNorm + spaceX), yBottom, 0.002 ADDX 2 * (xNorm + spaceX) brick xNorm, yBottom, 0.002 ADDX xNorm + spaceX brick xNorm, (yBottom + yNorm + spaceX), 0.002 DEL 3
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !positioning pad ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ADD (sdx + 14 * xSmall + 13 * spaceX + spaceC), (sdy + yBottom + 4 * yNorm + 5 * spaceX), 0.005 nButtons = 3 gosub "buttonSmallb" ADDY - 2 * (yNorm + spaceY) for j = 1 to 2 gosub "buttonNormal" ADDY yNorm + spaceY next j DEL j DEL 1
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !arrows ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ADD (sdx + 14 * xSmall + 13 * spaceX + spaceC), sdy , 0.005 nButtons = 3 gosub "buttonNormal" ADD xNorm + spaceX, yNorm + spaceY, 0 nButtons = 1 gosub "buttonNormal" DEL 2 else
!=================================================================================== !SIMPLE !=================================================================================== MATERIAL frMat
brick A, B, 0.005 ! body ADD 0.023, B - 0.017, -0.01 brick (A - 0.02 * 2), 0.017, 0.01 !support leg
DEL 1 ADD sdx, sdy, 0.005
MATERIAL kMat brick 14 * xSmall + 13 * spaceX, B - 2 * sdy, 0.002 !letterkeys DEL 1 ADD A - sdx - 4 * xNorm - 3 * spaceX, sdy, 0.005 brick 4 * xNorm + 3 * spaceX, B - 2 * sdy, 0.002 !numpad DEL 1 spaceD = (A - 2 * sdx - 14 * xSmall - 13 * spaceX - 7 * xNorm - 5 * spaceX) / 2 ADD sdx + 14 * xSmall + 13 * spaceX + spaceD, b -3 * yNorm + 2 * spaceY - 2 * sdy , 0.005
brick 3 * xNorm + 2 * spaceX, ySmall + 2 * yNorm + 2 * spaceY, 0.002 !positioning pad
ADD 0, -(3 * yNorm + 3 * spaceY), 0 prism_ 9, 0.002, 0, 0, 15, 3 * xNorm + 2 * spaceX, 0, 15, 3 * xNorm + 2 * spaceX, yNorm + spaceY, 15, 2 * xNorm + spaceX, yNorm + spaceY, 15, 2 * xNorm + spaceX, 2 * yNorm + spaceY, 15, xNorm + spaceX, 2 * yNorm + spaceY, 15, xNorm + spaceX, yNorm + spaceY, 15, 0,yNorm + spaceY, 15, 0, 0, -1 DEL 2 endif DEL 1
end
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !subroutines ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"buttonNormal": for i = 1 to nButtons brick xNorm, yNorm, 0.002 ADD xNorm + spaceX, 0, 0 next i del nButtons return
"buttonSmalla": for i = 1 to nButtons brick xSmall, ySmall, 0.002 ADD xSmall + spaceX, 0, 0 next i del nButtons return
"buttonSmallb": for i = 1 to nButtons brick xNorm, ySmall, 0.002 ADD xNorm + spaceX, 0, 0 next i del nButtons return
Symbol.Script_2D:
unID = 1 hotspot2 0, 0, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 A, 0, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 A, B, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 0, B, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 A/2, B/2, unID :unID = unID + 1
pen gs_cont_pen fill gs_fill_type poly2_B 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, B, 1, A, B, 1, A, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, B, -1
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! letter pad ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ADD2 0, B if gs_detlevel_2D_m = 1 then ADD2 sdx, -sdy rect2 0, 0, 14 * xSmall + 13 * spaceX, - (ySmall + 4 * yNorm + yBottom + 5 * spaceY) DEL 1 else !detailed ADD2 sdx, - sdy nButtons = 14 ! letter pad 1st row gosub "buttonSmalla" ADD2 0, -ySmall - spaceY - yNorm nButtons = 13 ! letter pad 2nd row gosub "buttonNormal" ADD2 13 * (xNorm + spaceX), 0 gosub "delTab" DEL 1 ADD2 0, - yNorm - spaceY gosub "delTab" ! letter pad 3rd row ADD2 (14 * (xSmall + spaceX)- 13 * (xNorm + spaceX)), 0 nButtons = 12 gosub "buttonNormal" DEL 1 ADD2 0, -yNorm - spaceY ! letter pad 4th row rect2 0, 0, xCaps, yNorm ADD2 xCaps + spaceX, 0 nButtons = 12 gosub "buttonNormal" ADD2 12 * (xNorm + spaceX), 0 k = 14 * (xSmall + spaceX) - ( 12 * (xNorm + spaceX)) - xCaps - 2 * spaceX poly2 7, 1, 0, 0, k, 0, k, 2 * yNorm + spaceY, k - xNorm, 2 * yNorm + spaceY, k - xNorm, yNorm + spaceY, 0, yNorm + spaceY, 0, 0 DEL 6 ADD2 sdx, - sdy - ySmall - 4 * yNorm - 4 * spaceY !letter pad 5th row rect2 0, 0, A / 20.47, yNorm ADD2 A / 20.47 + spaceX, 0 nButtons = 11 gosub "buttonNormal" ADD2 11 * (xNorm + spaceX), 0 m = 14 * (xSmall + spaceX) - (A / 20.47 + spaceX) - 11 * (xNorm + spaceX) - spaceX rect2 0, 0, m, yNorm DEL 2 ADD2 0, - yNorm - 2 * spaceY !letter pad 6th row gosub "control" rect2 0, 0, A / 20, yBottom ADD2 A / 20 + spaceX, 0 gosub "control" DEL 3 ADD2 A / 20.47 + 3 * xNorm + 4 * spaceX, 0 rect2 0, 0, 6 * xNorm + 5 * spaceX, yBottom ADD2 6 * xNorm + 6 * spaceX, 0 gosub "control" p = 2 * xNorm + m - 2 * o rect2 0, 0, p, yBottom ADD2 p + spaceX, 0 gosub "control" DEL 5 endif
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! positioning pad ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if gs_detlevel_2D_m = 1 then ! simple ADD2 14 * xSmall + 13 * spaceX + spaceC + sdx, - 3 * yNorm - 4 * spaceY rect2 0, 0, 3 * xNorm + 2 * spaceX, 3 * yNorm + 2 * spaceY DEL 1 else !detailed ADD2 14 * (xSmall + spaceX) + spaceC - spaceX, yBottom + 2 * yNorm + 3 * spaceY nButtons = 3 for j = 1 to 2 gosub "buttonNormal" ADD2 0, yNorm + spaceY next j gosub "buttonSmallb" DEL j
endif
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! arrows ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if gs_detlevel_2D_m = 1 then ! simple ADD2 14 * xSmall + 13 * spaceX + spaceC + sdx, - (sdy + ySmall + 4 * yNorm + yBottom + 5 * spaceY) poly2_B 9, 1, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 1, 0, yNorm + spaceY, 1, xNorm, yNorm + spaceY, 1, xNorm, 2 * yNorm + spaceY, 1, 2 * (xNorm + spaceX), 2 * yNorm + spaceY, 1, 2 * (xNorm + spaceX), yNorm + spaceY, 1, 3 * xNorm + 2 * spaceX, yNorm + spaceY, 1, 3 * xNorm + 2 * spaceX, 0, 1, 0, 0, -1 DEL 1 else ! detailed ADD2 14 * xSmall + 13 * spaceX + spaceC, 0 nButtons = 3 gosub "buttonNormal" ADD2 xNorm + spaceX, yNorm + spaceY nButtons = 1 gosub "buttonNormal" DEL 2 endif
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! numpad ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if gs_detlevel_2D_m = 1 then ! simple ADD2 A - sdx, -sdy rect2 0, 0, -4 * xNorm - 3 * spaceX, - (ySmall + 4 * yNorm + yBottom + 5 * spaceY) DEL 2 else ! detailed ADD2 A - 3 * spaceX - 4 * xNorm - 2 * sdx , 0 rect2 0, 0, 2 * xNorm + spaceX, yBottom ADD2 2 * xNorm + 2 * spaceX, 0 rect2 0, 0, xNorm, yBottom ADD2 xNorm + spaceX, 0 rect2 0, 0, xNorm, yBottom + yNorm + spaceY DEL 2 ADD2 0, yBottom + spaceY nButtons = 3 gosub "buttonNormal" ADD2 0, yNorm + spaceY nButtons = 4 for j = 1 to 3 gosub "buttonNormal" ADD2 0, yNorm + spaceY next j gosub "buttonSmallb" DEL 9 endif
end
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! subroutines ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"buttonNormal": for i = 1 to nButtons rect2 0, 0, xNorm, yNorm ADD2 xNorm + spaceX, 0 next i del nButtons return
"buttonSmalla": for i = 1 to nButtons rect2 0, 0, xSmall, -ySmall ADD2 xSmall + spaceX, 0 next i del nButtons return
"buttonSmallb": for i = 1 to nButtons rect2 0, 0, xNorm, ySmall ADD2 xNorm + spaceX, 0 next i del nButtons return
"delTab": ! del and tab for i = 1 to nButtons rect2 0, 0, (14 * (xSmall + spaceX)- 13 * (xNorm + spaceX)- spaceX), yNorm next i return
"control": o = (A / 20.47 + 3 * xNorm + spaceX - A / 20) / 2 rect2 0, 0, o, yBottom ADD2 o + spaceX, 0 return
Symbol.Script_1D:
! all different button dimensions !eN = A / 26 ! normal button X !eS = A / 25.3 ! top row X !eSh = A / 10.75 ! shift X !eC = A / 16.53 ! control X !eCl = A / 14.1 ! capslock X !fN = B / 7.125 ! normal button Y !fB = B / 6.16 ! bottom row Y !fS = B / 10.86 ! top row Y
xNorm = A / 26 ! normal button X xSmall = A / 25.3 ! top row X xShift = A / 10.75 ! shift X xCont = A / 16.53 ! control X xCaps = A / 14.1 ! capslock X yNorm = B / 7.125 ! normal button Y yBottom = B / 6.16 ! bottom row Y ySmall = B / 10.86 ! top row Y
! spaces between buttons sdx = A / 86 ! empty side x sdy = B / 22.8 ! empty side y spaceX = A / 172 spaceY = B / 45.6 spaceC = (A - 14 * xSmall - 18 * spaceX - 7 * xNorm - 2 * sdx) / 2
Symbol.Script_UI:
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! initialise all possible tabpage IDs dynamically ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------
TABID_ROOT = -1
_idxTab = 1 TABID_RepresentationAndSurfaces = _idxTab : _idxTab = _idxTab + 1 TABID_Descriptions = _idxTab : _idxTab = _idxTab + 1
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Page title and automatic tabpages setup ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------
ui_dialog `Параметры Клавиатуры Apple` ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Display actual tabpages using extended ui_page command ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------
ui_page TABID_RepresentationAndSurfaces, TABID_ROOT, `Отображение и Покрытия`, "uiTab_2DRepr_flat(1)" gosub "pageRepresentationAndSurfaces"
ui_page TABID_Descriptions, TABID_ROOT, `Характеристики`, "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)" gosub "pageDescriptions"
! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Image links for archive ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- file_dependence "uiTab_2DRepr_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)"
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------ end ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "pageRepresentationAndSurfaces": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ _idx = 1 dim paramNameReprArray[] dim childFlagReprArray[] dim iconNameReprArray[]
paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_2D_representation" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "" _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_detlevel_2D" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_detailLevel2D_flat(1)" _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_cont_pen" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)" _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_fill_type" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)" _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_fill_pen" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)" _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_back_pen" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)" _idx = _idx + 1
paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_3D_representation" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "" _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_detlevel_3D" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_detailLevel3D_flat(1)" _idx = _idx + 1 if gs_detlevel_3D_m <> 0 then ! Off paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_shadow" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_shadow_flat(1)" _idx = _idx + 1 endif
paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_material" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "" _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "useFactoryMats" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" _idx = _idx + 1 if not (useFactoryMats) then paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "frameMat" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "keybMat" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" _idx = _idx + 1 endif
file_dependence "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_detailLevel2D_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_detailLevel3D_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_shadow_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_surface_flat(1)"
call "ui_object_Representation" parameters all listFieldID = TABID_RepresentationAndSurfaces, paramNameArray = paramNameReprArray, childFlagArray = childFlagReprArray, iconNameArray = iconNameReprArray return
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "pageDescriptions": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ dim stParamNames[] stParamNames[1] = "gs_list_cost" stParamNames[2] = "gs_list_manufacturer" stParamNames[3] = "gs_list_note" stParamNames[4] = "gs_list_location" stParamNames[5] = "gs_list_accessories" stParamNames[6] = "gs_list_volts" stParamNames[7] = "FM_Type" stParamNames[8] = "FM_InventoryNumber" stParamNames[9] = "FM_SerialNumber" stParamNames[10] = "FM_ProductionYear" stParamNames[11] = "FM_ObjectWeight" stParamNames[12] = "FM_ObjectWeightUnit" stParamNames[13] = "FM_PowerConsumption" stParamNames[14] = "FM_Egress" stParamNames[15] = "gs_list_custom1" stParamNames[16] = "gs_list_custom2" stParamNames[17] = "gs_list_custom3" stParamNames[18] = "gs_list_custom4" stParamNames[19] = "gs_list_custom5"
call "ui_object_listing" parameters all listfieldID = TABID_Descriptions, listFieldPosY = 0, listFieldHeight = 265, stDescHeader = "", stValueHeader = "", stParamNames = stParamNames
return
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types" parameters all
lock "A", "B", "ZZYZX"
values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`, `Простой`, `Откл.` values "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 0, 1, 2
values "gs_detlevel_2D" `Простой`,`Детальный` values "gs_detlevel_2D_m" 1, 2
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" then if gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` then parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 else if gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` then parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 else parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 endif endif else if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then parameters gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` else if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then parameters gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` else parameters gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` endif endif endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_2D" then if gs_detlevel_2D = `Простой` then parameters gs_detlevel_2D_m = 1 else parameters gs_detlevel_2D_m = 2 endif else if gs_detlevel_2D_m = 1 then parameters gs_detlevel_2D = `Простой` else parameters gs_detlevel_2D = `Детальный` endif endif
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then HIDEPARAMETER "gs_shadow"
IF gs_cont_pen<=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_cont_pen=10 IF gs_fill_pen<=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_fill_pen=91
if useFactoryMats then lock "frameMat", "keybMat" hideparameter "frameMat", "keybMat" endif
hideparameter all "A", "B", "ZZYZX"
